    • Constructor Detail

      • GameManager

        public GameManager(App app,
                   java.lang.String configFile)
        Constructor. Intialises ghosts, calls parseConfigFile(), calls MapParser.parseMap(), calls addLivesIcons().
        Parameters:
        app - App instance.
        configFile - The configuration file that will specify the game settings and map.

    • Method Detail

      • action

        public void action(int keyCode)
        Handles the key press input. Up, right, left, down controls the player. Space toggles on debug mode. Otherwise, do nothing.
        Parameters:
        keyCode - An integer representing the current key pressed.

      • gameMove

        public void gameMove()
        Handles all the logic for the current frame. If there is no fruit left, player has won and application is closed. Calls methods on the waka and ghost instances (to do with collision and movement). Updates the sprites to be shown for each entity. Updates the current mode depending on the time. Checks if player has hit a ghost.

      • updateMode

        public void updateMode()
        Updates the current mode based on the current time. The soda can and super fruit override the normal modes, and once they are finished the mode goes back to what it was before the special fruit were picked up.

      • drawMap

        public void drawMap(App app)
        Draws the current state of the map.
        Parameters:
        app - App instance.

      • drawEntities

        public void drawEntities(App app)
        Draws the current location and sprite of each entity.
        Parameters:
        app - App instance.

      • ghostWakaCollide

        public void ghostWakaCollide(Ghost g,
                             Waka waka)
        Determine whether or not the player has collided with a ghost. Compares pixel coordinates between player and each ghost. If a ghost is hit, deduct a life. If there are no lives left, exit the application.
        Parameters:
        g - A ghost object
        waka - A waka object

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets all the modes and power ups, ghosts (including those that were killed) and Waka go back to starting location and left direction.

      • restart

        public void restart(java.lang.String message)
        Display the game end screen with the specified message for 10 seconds and then completely restart the game.
        Parameters:
        message - To be displayed on the screen

      • deductLifeIcon

        protected void deductLifeIcon()
        Removes the lifeIcon sprite from the right most tile that is currently showing the icon.

      • getWaka

        public Waka getWaka()
        Gets waka.
        Returns:
        waka

        public void setPathBlocks(java.util.List<java.util.List<PathBlock>> pathBlocks)
        Sets pathBlocks.
        Parameters:
        pathBlocks - Same size as map, value of a cell is null if it is not a PathBlock.

        Increments fruitLeft.

        Increments time.
        Parameters:
